contents.name: refRoadSegment
contents.description: Concerned road segment on which the observation has been made. Model:'https://schema.org/URL

contents.name: occupancy
contents.description: Property. Fraction of the observation time where a person has been occupying the observed walkway.

contents.name: averageCrowdSpeed
contents.description: Average speed of the crowd transiting during the observation period. Units:'Kilometer per hour (Km/h).'

contents.name: congested
contents.description: Flags whether there was a crowd congestion during the observation period in the referred walkway. The absence of this attribute means no crowd congestion.

contents.name: averageHeadwayTime
contents.description:
Average headway time. Headway time is the time
    elapsed between two consecutive persons.Units:'second (s)'

contents.name: direction
contents.description: Usual direction of travel in the walkway referred by this observation with respect to the city center. Enum:'inbound, outbound'
